title: Welcome to the Attendance Rule Setup wizard!
description: I'll guide you step-by-step through creating a new attendance rule for your organization. Let's make this process smooth and easy.

question.q1Main: What would you like to name this attendance rule?
question.q1Sub: Please provide a descriptive name for your rule
question.q2Main: What is the status for this attendance rule?
question.q2Sub: Select whether this rule will be immediately applied
question.q3Main: Which company should this attendance rule apply to?
question.q3Sub: Select the company where this rule will be implemented
